Raids

From DDO wiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Quests by ...
(sortable DPL by name, level†, XP, adpack, patron, favor) 		Quests by location Quests by update
Adventure packs Challenge quests Epic quests Free to Play quests Pay to Play quests Raids Wilderness adventure areas Sagas

This is a list of all Raids in the game.

Name of Raid Heroic
Level 		Epic
Level 		Adventure Pack Flagging Requirements
Tempest's Spine 10 - Free To Play No flagging is required for this raid and this raid has no timer mechanic.
The Reaver's Fate 14 - Ruins of Gianthold Complete Madstone Crater, Prison of the Planes, A Cabal for One, then Gianthold Tor.
Plane of Night 10 22 Vault of Night Complete the The Vault of Night raid.
The Titan Awakes 12 - The Restless Isles Complete The Twilight Forge raid.
Zawabi's Revenge 12 22 Demon Sands The Chamber of Raiyum ("The Wizard-King"), An Offering of Blood, and the Chains of Flame, and the items from each (turned into Zawabi), then the pre-raid quest Against the Demon Queen. (The item from Chains of Flame is exchanged for the one for Zawabi when you turn in the quest.)
The Vault of Night 10 22 Vault of Night Vault of Night (story arc): Tharashk Arena (VoN1), The Prisoner (VoN2), Gateway to Khyber/The Jungle of Khyber (VoN3), and Haywire Foundry (VoN4).
A Vision of Destruction 18 - The Vale of Twilight No flagging required.
Hound of Xoriat 18 - The Vale of Twilight No flagging required.
Ascension Chamber 17 - The Necropolis, Part 4 A completed Sigil:_Frame and the four paths of the Litany of the Dead pre-raid quest.
Tower of Despair 20 - The Devils of Shavarath A New Invasion, Bastion of Power, Genesis Point, & Sins of Attrition. Boots of Anchoring, Item:The Banhammer, OR Spell Absorption for end fight. Suggest visiting the ToD entrance to upgrade your Amrath portal (so it will teleport you directly to the raid entrance).
The Chronoscope 6 21 Devil Assault No flagging is required for this raid.
The Lord of Blades 20 22 Secrets of the Artificers Complete Blown to Bits, Power Play and Schemes of the Enemy (order does not matter) then talk to Ceros d'Cannith.
The Twilight Forge 11 - The Restless Isles A completed Sigil of Dal Quor.
The Shroud 17 - The Vale of Twilight Per The Thirteenth Eclipse: Running with the Devils, Rainbow in the Dark, Ritual Sacrifice, Let Sleeping Dust Lie, The Coalescence Chamber, and complete a Shavarath Signet Stone.
The Codex and the Shroud - 32 The Vale of Twilight Complete To Curse the Sky and Creeping Death in Meridia.
Legendary Hound of Xoriat - 32 Free To Play No flagging required.
Legendary Tempest's Spine - 32 Free To Play No flagging required.
The Fall of Truth - 25 Ruins of Gianthold Complete Return to Madstone Crater, Return to Prison of the Planes, Return to Cabal for One, then Return to Gianthold Tor.
Caught in the Web - 24 Menace of the Underdark All Menace of the Underdark quests.
Fire on Thunder Peak - 30 Shadow Under Thunderholme Defeat Dagan in The Ruins of Thunderholme.
Defiler of the Just - 30 Trials of the Archons The Archons' Trial, Demon Assault, The Devil's Details
Riding the Storm Out - 32 Dragonblood Prophecy Minimum Level 27, no flagging required.
The Curse of Strahd - 32 Mists of Ravenloft Complete the following chains in order (quests within chains can be completed in any order):
  • In the Shadow of the Castle (Death House, Fresh-baked Dreams, and An Invitation to Dinner)
  • The Vampire Hunters (Oath of Vengeance, A Raven at the Door, A Mad Tea Party, and Sealed in Amber)
  • The Light of the Land (The Final Vintage, Wrath of the Earth, Raven's Bane, and Sunrise)
Old Baba's Hut - 32 Mists of Ravenloft No flagging required.
Killing Time - 32 Dragonblood Prophecy Minimum Level 28, no flagging required.
Too Hot to Handle - 32 Masterminds of Sharn No flagging required.
Project Nemesis - 32 Masterminds of Sharn No flagging required.
Legendary Vision of Destruction 32 The Vale of Twilight No flagging required.
Legendary Master Artificer 32 [[]] No flagging required.
Legendary Lord of Blades 32 [[]] No flagging required.
Temple of the Deathwyrm - 30 Shadow Under Thunderholme Defeat Sarva Bellistrae in The Ruins of Thunderholme.
The Mark of Death - 30 The Necropolis, Part 4 Complete epic version of Desecrated Temple of Vol, Flesh Maker's Laboratory, Inferno of the Damned, and Ghosts of Perdition.
